attacks.name: Toxic Whip
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

abilities.name: Jungle Totem
abilities.text: Each basic Grass Energy attached to your Pokémon provides GrassGrass Energy. You can't apply more than 1 Jungle Totem Ability at a time.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hibernation Spore
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, that Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Flick Poison
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flippity Flap
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

attacks.name: Rally Back
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during their last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Wrapped in Wind
attacks.text: You may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pike
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Energy Reload
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Grass Energy from 1 of your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gaia Blaster
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Grass Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Brave Burn-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 150 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: High-Pressure Heat
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's High-Pressure Heat attack does 50 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Heat Cyclone
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scorching Breath
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Swagger
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Profane Punch
attacks.text: If your Benched Pokémon have any damage counters on them, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Plunge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may move all Energy from your Active Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch it with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Shocking Sting
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Aqua Bomb
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Blessings of the Deep
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has any Water Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Bail Out
attacks.text: Put a Water Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Resolute Blade
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dual Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Quad Smash
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Iron Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Powerful Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Lightning Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Voltail-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Booming Thunder
attacks.text: Attach a Lightning Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tag Team Boost
attacks.text: If Minun is on your Bench, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Storm Blade
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Intimidating Pattern
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks do 30 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Whiny Voice
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: Feverish Kiss
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Full Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Absorption
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psystrike-GX
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Legendary Guidance
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stellar Reign
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an evolved Pokémon, devolve it by putting all of the Evolution cards on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Triple Smash
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 more damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Let Loose
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may have each player shuffle their hand into their deck and draw 4 cards.

attacks.name: Shadow Punch
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Cursed Whirlpool
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Torment
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Dangerous Head
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, this attack does 50 more damage.

abilities.name: Trade
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Riotous Beating
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Trickster-GX
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oblivion Wing
attacks.text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Scoundrel Guard
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Dragon Pulse
attacks.text: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Sky Judgment
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fabled Defense
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent's attacks.

attacks.name: Ultimate Arrow
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Damage Mover
rules: Move 3 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hau
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lillie
rules: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If it's your first turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Breeder
rules: Draw 2 cards and heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon. If you have no cards in your deck, you can't play this card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Catcher
rules: Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Sophocles
rules: Discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, draw 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Super Scoop Up
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Double Colorless Energy
rules: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

name: Warp Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy.When you attach this card from your hand to your Active Pokémon, switch that Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
